abstract: BYD Company, the Chinese battery and car maker that counts Warren E. Buffett as an investor, said Friday it has agreed to buy an 18 percent stake in a Tibetan-based lithium and boron miner, moving to secure a strategically vital asset for its future growth.
snippet: BYD Company, the Chinese battery and car maker that counts Warren E. Buffett as an investor, said Friday it has agreed to buy an 18 percent stake in a Tibetan-based lithium and boron miner, moving to secure a strategically vital asset for its futu...
lead_paragraph: BYD Company, the Chinese battery and car maker that counts Warren E. Buffett as an investor, said Friday it has agreed to buy an 18 percent stake in a Tibetan-based lithium and boron miner, moving to secure a strategically vital asset for its future growth, The Associated Press reported.

headline.main: China’s BYD in Strategic Move for Tibet Miner
